meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the deliberate killing of a large group of people, especially those of a particular ethnic group.
meanings.sent1: The genocidal regime targeted innocent civilians based on their ethnicity.
meanings.sent2: The dictator's genocidal actions led to the loss of many lives.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed a genocidal villain who wanted to eliminate an entire population for power.
meanings.sent4: The spread of hatred can be as genocidal as any weapon.
meanings.sent5: The haunting images of the genocidal massacre will forever be etched in history.
